price: 29. (Epai nangai) liloba libongwanaka te, mpe nazali mobubi ya bawumbu te.
arabic: مَا يُبَدَّلُ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ لَدَيَّ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ بِظَلَّٰمٖ لِّلۡعَبِيدِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: mā yubaddalu al-qawlu ladayya wamā anā biẓallāmin lil'ʿabīdi
